text: Miss Ecuador 2015, the 65th Miss Ecuador pageant, was held on March 14, 2015.http://www.eluniverso.com/vida-estilo/2014/09/19/nota/3987221/eleccion- candidatas-miss-ecuador Alejandra Argudo, Miss Ecuador 2014 from Manabí crowned successor Francesca Cipriani from Guayas as Miss Ecuador 2015. The winner represented Ecuador at Miss Universe 2015, the 1st Runner-up competed at Miss International 2015, and the 2nd Runner participated at Miss Supranational 2015. ==Results== ===Placements=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Final results ! Contestant |- | Miss Ecuador 2015 | * 22x20px Guayas - Francesca Cipriani |- | 1st Runner-up | * 22x20px Azuay - Daniela Armijos |- | 2nd Runner-up | * 22x20px Guayas - María Emilia Cevallos |- | 3rd Runner-up | * 22x20px Pichincha - Mariagloria Dávalos |- | 4th Runner-up | * 22x20px Pichincha - María Guadalupe Arias |- | 5th Runner-up | * 22x20px Guayas - Andrea Garzón |- |} ===Special Awards=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Award ! Contestant |- | Miss Congeniality | * 22x20px Azuay - María Elisa Padilla |- | Miss Photogenic | * 22x20px Cotopaxi - María de los Ángeles Espín |- | Miss Sedal | * 22x20px Guayas - Francesca Cipriani |- | Miss Puntuality | * 22x20px Guayas - Francesca Cipriani |- | Miss Cielo | * 22x20px Pichincha - Mariagloria Dávalos |- | Miss Kotex | * 22x20px Guayas - María Emilia Cevallos |- | Best National Costume | * 22x20px Azuay - María Elisa Padilla (Francisco Vanegas) |- |} ===Best National Costume=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! María Gloria Dávalos (Carlos Aguilar) |- |} ==Contestants== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !width="200"| Province||width="275"|Contestant||width="50"|Age||width="75"|Height (cm)||width="75"|Height (ft in)||width="200"|Hometown |- | 22x20px Azuay | Daniela Armijos Cordero | 19 | | Cuenca |- | 22x20px Azuay | María Elisa Padilla Cardoso | 21 | | Cuenca |- | 22x20px Carchi | Marlice Belén Grijalva Moya | 19 | | Tulcan |- | 22x20px Chimborazo | Ariana Salomé Freire Cevallos | 20 | | Riobamba |- | 22x20px Cotopaxi | María de los Ángeles Espín Díaz | 22 | | Latacunga |- | 22x20px El Oro | Mirka Paola Cabrera Mazzini | 19 | | Machala |- | 22x20px Esmeraldas | Andrea Cristina Lara Jijón | 22 | | Esmeraldas |- | 22x20px Esmeraldas | Nathaly Judith Quiñónez Ortiz | 19 | | Quinindé |- | 22x20px Guayas | María Emilia Cevallos Cuesta | 22 | | Guayaquil |- | 22x20px Guayas | Francesca Keyko Cipriani Burgos | 22 | | Guayaquil |- | 22x20px Guayas | Andrea Paola Garzón Parrales | 25 | | Guayaquil |- | border Imbabura | Angela Maritza Bonilla Zapata | 22 | | San Miguel de Urcuquí |- | 22x20px Loja | Karla Jhulieth Reynel Ríos | 19 | | Loja |- | 22x20px Pichincha | María Guadalupe Arias Mendoza | 21 | | Quito |- | 22x20px Pichincha | Mariagloria Dávalos Guevara | 19 | | Quito |- | 22x20px Pichincha | Andrea Estefanía Barragán Larco | 21 | | Quito |- | 22x20px Santo Domingo | Jexandra Mishelle Mecías Torres | 20 | | Santo Domingo |- | 22x20px Tungurahua | María Paz Mayorga Medina | 20 | | Ambato |- |} ==Notes== ===Returns=== Last compete in: *2009 **22x20px Cotopaxi **border Imbabura *2010 **22x20px Chimborazo **22x20px Tungurahua *2011 **22x20px Carchi ===Withdraws=== *22x20px Manabí *22x20px Orellana *22x20px Santa Elena *22x20px Sucumbíos ==Crossovers== *Elisa Padilla was Reina de Cuenca 2014. *Ariana Freire was Reina de Riobamba 2013. *Mirka Cabrera was Reina de Machala 2014. She competed at Reina Mundial del Banano Ecuador 2014 where she was 1st Runne-up. *Andrea Lara was Reina de Esmeraldas 2013. *Francesca Cipriani was Miss Universitaria 2010, Chica Look Cyzone Ecuador 2011, Chica Look Cyzone Latinoamerica 2011, and she compented in Miss Italia Nel Mondo Ecuador 2012 where she was 4th place. *Marlice Grijalva competed in Reina de Ibarra 2014, she was 3rd Runner-up. *Nathaly Quiñónez was Reina de Quinindé 2013, and she competed in Reina de Esmeraldas 2013 where she was 2nd Runner-up. *Ángela Bonilla competed in Miss World Ecuador 2013, she was unplaced. ==References== ==External links== *Official Miss Ecuador website Ecuador Category:Beauty pageants in Ecuador Category:Miss Ecuador
title: Miss Ecuador 2015
